MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews, affecting properties in Golf Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.01am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.55am on Monday 5th April 2021.
